nycTheatreExcerpt: The show is even better in its uptown transfer, with bigger physical performances and punchier deliveries of the hilarious lines in Escola's script. Laughs are rarely more than a few seconds apart. It is, without a doubt, the funniest comedy on Broadway right now.
